Can't Catch Me

Rules

Goal is to capture as many ghosts üëª as possible in the smallest confined area. The game works from right to left. That means your ending box should be the top left corner. If you draw a line and a ghost is on the right side, well... you should say goodbye to that ghost ‚òπÔ∏è. Remember all ghosts move at different speed and have different sizes. Make sure you account for that. If you shoot a laser when a ghost was directly on the laser, they will wiggle uncontrollably because they are being consistently hit by the laser! Don't torture the ghosts! They have feelings too!

Instructions

  • Arrow keys and "WASD" control the arrows in the bottom right corner
  • To shoot a laser beam you can use 'Z' or 'K' for a vertical laser and 'X' and 'L' to shoot lasers horizontally
  • You should be trying to get the smallest score possible, because your score represents your final confined area
  • Lastly play to have fun!
